title: What's For Dinner?
itunes:title: What's For Dinner?
description:
In this Episode, Bobby and Sophie ask the age old question "What's for dinner?"

Bobby and Sophie share their different sources for recipe inspiration, from social media posts to more traditional means. Also, Bobby makes penne alla vodka for Sophie, and they discuss what makes pasta such a versatile solution to the question "What's for Dinner?".

For more updates on "Always Hungry", follow the hosts on their instagram pages:

Bobby Flay's Instagram page: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay's Instagram page: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
